content: this free crochet afghan pattern uses hexagon blocks so you can make a modern baby blanket or easily customize the size however you wish each hexagon block is roughly 6 wide x 5 tall so if you know the size of the finished blanket you d like to make you can use this pattern to make a stroller blanket baby blanket lap blanket or even a bedspread for this hexagon afghan i used i love this cotton from hobby lobby it s just the softest most affordable cotton yarn i ve found and it comes in enough colors to make me dizzy as i stand in the aisle and try to choose some this is a wonderfully modern portable crochet project visit the blog for the full free pattern
